snippet: Through a program by USRowing, the Chicago Training Center aims to introduce youths of all backgrounds to the sport, returning it to its blue-collar roots.
abstract: Nonprofit Chicago Training Center offers free rowing program affiliated with USRowing to introduce low-income youths to the sport; center was founded by Montana Butsch.
lead_paragraph: Through a program by USRowing, the Chicago Training Center aims to introduce youths of all backgrounds to the sport, returning it to its blue-collar roots.

headline.main: Rowing Toward Hope in a Troubled World
headline.print_headline: Rowing Toward Hope in a Troubled World
